name: Planet Jumper (BitBandit98)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

Hold Left click over the asteroids to begin destroying them, you'll get money upon destruction.

Use money to upgrade one of 6 different facilities.

Get money to make money to go faster and faster and see how far you can get.

CHEATS

[E] - Double Speed

[R] - Restart

[F] - Add 100,000 Credits

[Q] - Add 1E36f Credits
